title: I Wanted To Try It
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Emma-san, thanks for waiting! Here you go.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Uwaaah, it’s a watermelon~! Thank you, Hanamaru-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru is glad you like it. When you think of summer, it has to be watermelons zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hey, Hanamaru-chan. In Japan, when people eat watermelons, you would have a competition to see who can launch the seeds the furthest, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh? Well, sometimes we do, but it’s not like we always do it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’ve always wanted to try it, Hanamaru-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Uuu, don’t look at me so expectantly zura....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Please....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Hmm, okay! But if we’re doing it, Maru won’t go easy and won’t lose to you zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Of course! I’ve never done this before, but I’ve got a feeling I can do it well♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
